DOC.brief_summary: Primary objective : safety tolerability BI 10773 male female patient type 2 diabetes Secondary objective : pharmacokinetics pharmacodynamics BI 10773
DOC.brief_title: 4 Week Treatment With Three Oral Doses BI 10773 Patients With Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Male postmenopausal hysterectomised female patient type 2 diabetes Age > 18 < 70 year BMI > 18.5 < 40 kg/m2 Antidiabetic treatment insulin glitazones one oral hypoglycaemic agent ; Fasted blood glucose > 240 mg/dl ( > 13.3 mmol/L ) blood glucose level 400 mg/dl ( 22.2 mmol/L ) postprandially ; HbA1c > 8.5 %
